descriptionHtml:
[center][line]

[size=6]Camillia[/size]

[line]

Camillia is a Breton Spellsword and she can be found just to the left as you enter Dragonsreach in Whiterun.

She will be naked when you first find her and I have done this on purpose so you can give her the clothing/armor and weapons you want with no hassles.

FBR stands for Follower by Rhys.

[line]

[size=6]Requirements[/size]

[line]

Sorry I tried to make it standalone but had no idea how so you will need some stuff for her to work.

You will need the ApachiiSkyHair main file found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]here[/url].

[line]

[size=6]Installation[/size]

[line]

Use NMM or MO to install or if your doing it manually then just copy the files downloaded here and place them in your Skyrim data folder.

[line]

[size=6]Uninstallation[/size]

[line]

Just deactivate in NMM or MO or delete the "CamilliaFollower.esp" and the meshes and textures you can go find them to remove otherwise no harm done if they are just left there.

[line]

[size=6]The Art of Skyrim[/size]

[line]

Just put this here for anybody who may be interested.

The Art of Skyrim is an episodic series I make that showcases some of the latest and greatest screenshots/art by the community.

Subscribe to my youtube channel [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOBIhGllq8jQq95AfH93asg]here[/url].
